hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sed -i s/TARGET_BUILD_VERSION/LATEST/g ui/Dockerfile GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7`
export APP_ID=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/APP_ID_HEX` export RESOURCE_ID=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/RESOURCE_ID_HEX` export AUTH0_CLIENT_ID=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/psamaui_settings.json | grep client_id | cut -d ":" -f 2 | sed 's/\",*//g'`
sed -i "s/__STACK_SPECIFIC_APPLICATION_ID__/$APP_ID/g" ui/src/main/webapp/picsureui/settings/settings.json sed -i "s/__STACK_SPECIFIC_RESOURCE_UUID__/$RESOURCE_ID/g" ui/src/main/webapp/picsureui/settings/settings.json sed -i "s/__AUTH0_CLIENT_ID__/$AUTH0_CLIENT_ID/g" ui/src/main/webapp/psamaui/settings/settings.json
cd ui docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-ui-overrides:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-ui-overrides:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-ui-overrides:LATEST
